name: a Valentine's day in Q's life
name_original: a Valentine's day in Q's life
description:
[00q fangame]  ♡ Help Q set up the perfect Valentine’s day date with Bond. ♡

The sequel to 7 days in Q’s life, but you don’t need to have played it to play this one.

Warnings: very cheesy + rating T for sexual innuendos

> THREE ENDINGS with only one true ending
> two easter eggs
> short gameplay

> CREDITS Big thanks to artificial.music again. Check out their Soundcloud here. They make stunning royalty-free work.

> SOUNDTRACK
